last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 3
last_episode_to_air.overview: We meet the pilots flying out of two of easyJet's regional bases: Manchester and Newcastle and we join Senior First Officer Iris De Kan on her mission to become a Captain. First Officer Ajit and Captain Steve have four short domestic flights.

name: easyJet: Inside the Cockpit
overview: Britain's biggest low-cost airline is getting ready for its busiest year ever more planes, more routes, more flights and more passengers. Rookie Pilots will follow the ups and downs of easyJet's new recruits as they take to the air for the very first time.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: This episode follows the rookies' progress from the classroom to the cockpit.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Newly qualified 20 year old Ryan Clyde has his first landing in Paris, in the dark, and with passengers on board.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Meeting the pilots who have to battle with delays, deal with a sick passenger and negotiate landing at one of the world's most challenging airports in the heart of the Alps. Captain Emma Henderson faces technical breakdowns and severe turbulence.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: We meet the pilots who have to trouble-shoot a cockpit warning light mid-flight and witness rare meteorological displays at 35-thousand feet. We will also meet the cadets who will take to the skies for the first time with paying passengers.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: We meet the pilots flying out of two of easyJet's regional bases: Manchester and Newcastle and we join Senior First Officer Iris De Kan on her mission to become a Captain. First Officer Ajit and Captain Steve have four short domestic flights.
